project.name: J-C252A-LUCE-03-ST02-DT01-DF18-CF07-01
project.description: This weakness takes a value and converts it to upper case. If it contains characters not a-zA-Z, then the function used to covert to upper case will return null. After converting the value to upper case it is compared to a static password. This comparison will cause an error if the value contained a number, punctuation, space, etc.

iopair.name: J-C252A-LUCE-03-ST02-DT01-DF18-CF07-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: index a single file Environment variable

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND GOOD-02 AND GOOD-03 AND GOOD-04 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

output_checks.simple_check: if [[ -a ../testData/good-01-index/_0.cfe ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
if [[ -a ../testData/good-01-index/_0.cfs ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
